attributes.action: Ensure equality of access to childcare for disabled children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disabled children have little access to childcare, either formal or informal and a high proportion of families with disabled children live in poverty. Local Authorities need to be enabled to provide statutory funding for childcare places for disabled children - including those with the most severe disabilities - to enable their parents to work. Childcare must be equivalent to that on offer for non-disabled children.
